name: Broccoli Salad with bacon
instructions:
1)Add the chopped broccoli, cheddar, onion, almonds, and bacon to a large mixing bowl and stir to combine
2)Add mayo, sour cream, onion powder, and vinegar to a small mixing bowl and stir as well
3)Pour the dressing over the broccoli mixture and stir well to coat
additionalInfo: Sometimes I just want to eat some salad and this broccoli salad is super easy to make and very tasty.
